      • getTileTypeByLocation

        public TileType getTileTypeByLocation​(int layer,
                                      float x,
                                      float y)
        Returns the tiletype on an x and y coordinate of the game world.
        Parameters:
        layer - layer of the tile or
        x - x-coordinate of the tile position
        y - y-coordinate of the tile position
        Returns:
        returns the method get tile type by coordinate, which is a conversion of x and y into the grid map columns and rows and the method returns the tile type.

      • doesRectCollideWithMap

        public boolean doesRectCollideWithMap​(float x,
                                      float y,
                                      int width,
                                      int height)
        The collision method, if the x and y cordinate of an object and it's dimensions overlap with any tiles around it's boundaries, math ceilings are used to round up to ensure the entire surrounding of an object is covered. The method has a triple nested for loop to iterate through the layer's, y-axis, x-axis surrounding the parameters.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinates of an object
        y - y-coordinates of an object
        width - width of an object
        height - height of an object
        Returns:
        if the tile is not null (to make sure there is a tile on that layer) and then the tile is collidable then return true, else false.
